title: Part 1
subtitle: Invocations

title: Part 2
subtitle: Preparations for Śrī Rāma's installation as the Prince Regent of Ayodhyā; the god's concern over the same and their approaching Goddess Sarasvatī for help

title: Part 3
subtitle: Sarasvatī perverts the mind of Mantharā (a handmaid of queen Kaikeyī); a dialogue between Kaikeyī and Mantharā

title: Part 4
subtitle: Kaikeyī enters the sulking-chamber

title: Part 5
subtitle: Dialogue between king Daśaratha and Kaikeyī; Daśaratha's lamentation; Sumantra goes to the palace and, returning from it, sends Śrī Rāma to His father

title: Part 6
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma and mother Kaikeyī

title: Part 7
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma and His father; the sadness of the people of Ayodhyā; their remonstrances with Kaikeyī

title: Part 8
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma and mother Kausalyā

title: Part 9
subtitle: Dialogue between Sītā and Śrī Rāma

title: Part 10
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma, Kausalyā and Sītā

title: Part 11
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma and Lakṣmaṇa

title: Part 12
subtitle: Dialogue between Lakṣmaṇa and mother Sumitrā

title: Part 13
subtitle: Śrī Rāma, Lakṣmaṇa and Sītā call on king Daśaratha to take leave of him; Daśaratha's advice to Sītā

title: Part 14
subtitle: Śrī Rāma, Sītā and Lakṣmaṇa proceed to the woods and slip past the citizens buried in slumber

title: Part 15
subtitle: Śrī Rāma's arrival at srngaverapura; the Niṣāda chief's services

title: Part 16
subtitle: Dialogue between Lakṣmaṇa and the Niṣāda; Sumantra's dialogue with Śrī Rāma and Sītā and his returning to Ayodhyā

title: Part 17
subtitle: The boatman's love and the passage across the Gaṅgā

title: Part 18
subtitle: Arrival at Prayāga and dialogue between Śrī Rāma and the sage Bharadvāja; the love of the people inhabiting the bank of the Yamunā

title: Part 19
subtitle: The episode of an ascetic

title: Part 20
subtitle: Śrī Rāma greets the Yamunā; love of the villagers

title: Part 21
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma and the sage Vālmīki

title: Part 22
subtitle: Śrī Rāma takes up His abode at Citrakūṭa; the services of the Kolas and Bhīlas

title: Part 23
subtitle: Sumantra returns to Ayodhyā and finds the city a picture of grief

title: Part 24
subtitle: Dialogue between king Daśaratha and Sumantra, Daśaratha's passing away

title: Part 25
subtitle: The sage Vasiṣṭha sends envoys to call Bharata

title: Part 26
subtitle: Arrival and lamentation of Bharata and Śatrughna

title: Part 27
subtitle: Dialogue between Bharata and mother Kausalyā and king Daśaratha's cremation

title: Part 28
subtitle: Dialogue between the sage Vasiṣṭha and Bharata; Bharata prepares for a journey to Citrakūṭa in order to bring Śrī Rāma back to Ayodhyā

title: Part 29
subtitle: Departure of Bharata and Śatrughna with the citizens of Ayodhyā to the woods

title: Part 30
subtitle: The Niṣāda's suspicion and precautions

title: Part 31
subtitle: Bharata's meeting and dialogue with the Niṣāda chief; the love of Bharata and the citizens of Ayodhyā for Śrī Rāma

title: Part 32
subtitle: Bharata's arrival at Prayāga and dialogue between Bharata and the sage Bharadvāja

title: Part 33
subtitle: Bharadvāja shows hospitality to Bharata

title: Part 34
subtitle: Dialogue between Indra and his preceptor (the sage Bṛhaspati)

title: Part 35
subtitle: Bharata on his way to Citrakūṭa

title: Part 36
subtitle: Sitas dream; the Kolas and Kirātas bring news of Bharata's arrival to Śrī Rāma; Śrī Rāma's concern at the report; Lakṣmaṇa's outburst of passion

title: Part 37
subtitle: Śrī Rāma admonishes Lakṣmaṇa and dwells on Bharata's greatness

title: Part 38
subtitle: Bharata takes a dip in the Mandākinī and arrives at Citrakūṭa; Bharata and others meet one another, mourn the king's death and perform his Śrāddha (obsequies)

title: Part 39
subtitle: Hospitality of the foresters towards Bharata and his party; Kaikeyī's remorse

title: Part 40
subtitle: Vasiṣṭha's speech

title: Part 41
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma, Bharata and others

title: Part 42
subtitle: King Janaka's arrival at Citrakūṭa; the Kolas and Kirātas offer presents to the visitors and all meet one another

title: Part 43
subtitle: Dialogue between queens Kausalyā and Sunayanā (king Janaka's wife); Sītā's amiability

title: Part 44
subtitle: Dialogue between king Janaka and his wife; Bharata's glory

title: Part 45
subtitle: Dialogue between king Janaka and Bharata; Indra's anxiety; Goddess Sarasvatī's admonition to Indra

title: Part 46
subtitle: Dialogue between the sage Vasiṣṭha, Śrī Rāma and Bharata

title: Part 47
subtitle: Bharata deposits the sacred waters; his perambulation through Citrakūṭa

title: Part 48
subtitle: Dialogue between Śrī Rāma and Bharata; the gift of sandals; Bharata's farewell

title: Part 49
subtitle: Returning to Ayodhyā, Bharata enthrones the sandals and takes up his residence at Nandigrama; the virtue of listening to Bharata's story
